thumb.name: You're Special
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EThinking%3Cbr%3Eof%3Cbr%3Eyou.%3Cbr%3EKelly...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E ...and remembering%3Cbr%3Eall the things you do%3Cbr%3Ethat make you%3Cbr%3Esomeone special%3Cbr%3Ein my life.

thumb.name: A Smile to My Face
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThinking of you...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...always brings%3Cbr%3Ea smile%3Cbr%3Eto my face.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Nice People
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMy Thanks%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI%26#146;m always awed%3Cbr%3Eby nice people.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThanks.%3Cbr%3EHillary!%3Cbr%3E
